title: Snowed in with the Guy Next Door
description: ChristaI've come to Snowflake Falls from the city.I'm left running my aunt's candy store during the Christmas rush.But my biggest problem is the huge, hot guy next door.He’s the town sheriff and he thinks he’s the boss.I didn’t expect the weather to take a turn for the worse.What will I do when I’m snowed in with the guy I can’t stand?MichaelI know this small town like the back of my hand.Ensuring law and order is upheld is my day to day life.But I’m not expecting Christa to shake everything up.She’s gorgeous - but she might be hiding something.When we’re trapped together on the mountain I can’t believe it.Is she the girl of my dreams or BIG trouble?♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥Welcome back to Snowflake Falls, where the holidays are fine, the scenery is spectacular and the men are hotter than ever! Each story is standalone, but keep an eye out for recurring characters and families. Steamy, upbeat insta-love short read featuring a small town enemies to lovers romance and a guaranteed HEA!
author: Jessa Joy
